solution_line_template: After half an hour, the number of balloons that had blown up is {initial_fraction_blown_up}*{total_balloons} = <<{initial_fraction_blown_up}*{total_balloons}={initial_blown_up_balloons}>>{initial_blown_up_balloons}

The number of balloons that haven't blown up so far is {total_balloons}-{initial_blown_up_balloons} = <<{total_balloons}-{initial_blown_up_balloons}={remaining_after_half_hour}>>{remaining_after_half_hour}

In the next hour, {multiplier_next_hour}*{initial_blown_up_balloons} = <<{multiplier_next_hour}*{initial_blown_up_balloons}={additional_blown_up_balloons}>>{additional_blown_up_balloons} balloons blow up.

The number of balloons that haven't blown up now is {remaining_after_half_hour}-{additional_blown_up_balloons} = <<{remaining_after_half_hour}-{additional_blown_up_balloons}={final_intact_balloons}>>{final_intact_balloons}
